src:
Pri natáčaní novej marvelovky našli bombu, na nakrúcaní bola vtedy aj Angelina Jolie. Miesto evakuovali
05 Nov 2019, 21:53 by Vladimír Mičuda

Ešte šťastie, že sa nikomu nič nestalo. Nechceme si to ani predstaviť.

Približne v tomto čase o rok si zájdeme do kina na novú marvelovku Eternals. Ak ťa už istým spôsobom nudia Avegeneri a chcel by si vidieť nové tváre, bude to skvelá príležitosť. Na striebornom plátne totiž uvidíme Kita Haringtona, Angelinu Jolie či Salmu Hayek, je sa teda na čo tešiť. Film bude režírovať Chloe Zhao. Teda, do kina pôjdeme len v tom prípade, ak všetko pôjde podľa plánov.



EpicStream s odvolaním sa na The Sun informuje, že hercov museli počas natáčania evakuovať. Dôvodom bola bomba, no našťastie ju tam nedoniesol terorista. Malo by ísť o bombu z čias nacistického Nemecka, je teda stará niekoľko desiatok rokov. 
Nikomu sa našťastie nič nestalo a všetkých ľudí vrátane Angeliny Jolie a Richarda Maddena evakuovali. Následne prišli pyrotechnici a o bombu sa postarali. 
Eternals od Marvelu má premiéru 6. novembra 2020, no zatiaľ nemáme ani len fotografie z natáčania, nie to ešte trailer. Ešte len teda uvidíme, čo si pre nás komiksové štúdio prichystalo.




ĎALŠIE ČLÁNKY, KTORÉ BY ŤA MOHLI ZAUJÍMAŤ
text:
They found a bomb while filming a new marvel game, and then there was also Angelina Jolie. Place evacuated
05 Nov 2019, 21:53 by Vladimir Micuda

Fortunately, nothing happened to anyone. We don't even want to imagine.

At about this time in a year we will go to the cinema for the new marvelovka Eternals. If the Avegeneri is bothering you in some way and would like to see new faces, it will be a great opportunity. On the silver screen we can see Kit Harington, Angelina Jolie and Salma Hayek, so there is a lot to look forward to. The film will be directed by Chloe Zhao. So, we only go to the cinema if everything goes according to plan.



EpicStream, referring to The Sun, reports that the actors had to evacuate while filming. The reason was the bomb, but fortunately it was not carried by a terrorist. It should be a bomb from the time of Nazi Germany, so it is several decades old.
Fortunately, nobody happened and evacuated all people, including Angelina Jolie and Richard Madden. Then the fireworks came and took care of the bomb.
Eternals by Marvel has its premiere on November 6, 2020, but so far we have not only photos from filming, not yet a trailer. So just see what the comics studio has prepared for us.
